name: AI Kart Racer
description:
3D Kart Racing game with fully AI controlled racers. 

Instructions

Shoot at your opponents to win! To shoot, first start aiming by holding the left trigger, or aim directly backwards by holding the left bumper. Then, focus on the target by holding the right trigger. If you've locked on successfully, an aim indicator will appear around the target. Once that indicator turns red, release the right trigger to fire. Getting shot knocks a racer off course, respawning a few seconds later. The enemies can shoot back at the player and each other, so be careful!

Press the right bumper to boost. Each player gets a single boost charge each time they shoot an enemy. 

Be the first to complete 3 laps to win.

Controls

Game is fully controllable with controller only

Steer/Accelerate: Left Stick
Start Aiming: Left Trigger
Start Aiming (Backward): Left Bumper
Focus: Right Trigger
Shoot: Release Right Trigger when Aim Indicator is red
Boost: Right Bumper
